sm::eod::FeatureCircle

FeatureCircle Class Reference

#include <featurecircle.h>

Inherits FeatureOutputData.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A feature within an image that is represented by a circle.

float radius (  )  const

Returns:
radius of the circle. This is a normalised value (between 0 and 1) and is in image coordinates Set to invalidValue() if this value is invalid

void setGeometry ( float  x,
float  y,
float  radius 
)

Set the geometry of this circle feature.

Parameters:
x X-coordinate of the circle centre point in normalised image coordinates
y Y-coordinate of the circle centre point in normalised image coordinates
radius Radius of the circle.
Precondition:
x in range 0..1 or x == invalidValue()

y in range 0..1 or y == invalidValue()

radius in range 0..1 or radius == invalidValue()

float x (  )  const

Returns:
x-coordinate of the centre point. This is a normalised value (between 0 and 1) and is in image coordinates. Set to invalidValue() if this value is invalid

float y (  )  const

Returns:
y-coordinate of the centre point. This is a normalised value (between 0 and 1) and is in image coordinates Set to invalidValue() if this value is invalid
